element.name: Brayherd
element.description:
ALECANI
These haughty beastmen owe their culture to otherworld travelers whom they worship as gods. Extremely tough in both mind and body, the Brayherds are renown throughout the world as exceptional warriors and extremely talented orators. Ability Score Increase.Your Strength increases by 2, and one other ability score increases by 1.
Age.Brayherds reach maturity around the age of 16 and live for about 80 years.
AlignmentBrayherds are known to be rational in their own way, willing to give other ways of thinking a chance no matter how much they believe in their own superiority.
Size.Brayherds stand at about seven to eight feet tall, but usually somewhere in the middle. They have large, extremely muscular bodies around 200 to 300 pounds. Your size is medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 40 feet.
Darkvision.Brayherd eyes are adapted to allow them to see just fine in the dark, an adaptation from their primitive past on the plains of Caprae Loco.
